page.title: 02ROCKMEADOW KENNELS+CATTERY
page.content: Mr. and Mrs. Morgan run the dog kennels and cattery. It costs.... from Â£2.50 a day for a small dog. from Â£2.50 a day for a medium dog. from Â£2.90 a day for a large dog. The dogs are taken for a run every day.There are 1.7 hectares of land. The cats and dogs must not have a disease when they arrive at the kennels. Families of dogs share a kennel. Here are the grooming prices:_ small dog, from Â£7.00 medium dog, from Â£9.00 large dog,from Â£10.00. If special food is required it can be arranged, otherwise it is Choosy or Vitalin and Value Mix.
